function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher gene equivalent concentrations in the effluent than the influent due to repartitioning of gene material during wastewater treatment.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through higher gene equivalent concentrations in the treated effluent.","Mitigation":"Improved wastewater treatment processes to effectively eliminate or reduce gene material in the effluent.","Technologies":"Advanced filtration and disinfection technologies for wastewater treatment.","People":"Community members exposed to the treated effluent.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment plant operators"},{"Description":"Viral RNA is not eliminated in the treated wastewater, indicating potential presence of contagious viruses.","Impact":"Risk of spreading infectious viruses through the treated wastewater.","Mitigation":"Enhanced treatment methods to effectively eliminate infectious viral RNA.","Technologies":"Viral RNA detection and removal technologies for wastewater treatment.","People":"Community members exposed to the treated wastewater.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment plant operators"},{"Description":"Inability to detect infectious SARS-CoV-2 particles in the treated sewage despite the presence of viral RNA fragments.","Impact":"Potential underestimation of the infectious potential of treated sewage.","Mitigation":"Development of more sensitive detection methods for infectious SARS-CoV-2 particles in treated sewage.","Technologies":"Advanced viral particle detection and analysis technologies.","People":"Community members exposed to the treated sewage.","Owner":"Research institutions and wastewater treatment plant operators"}]}
